title: Talking about Trouble - italicization is used to

content.question: In Paragraph 6, italicization is used to

choices.label: emphasize a difference between appearance and reality
signal an ironic point of view
suggest a conventional way to understand a situation

content.answer: emphasize a difference between appearance and reality

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
